1: Once upon a time, there lived a happy family.
2:
The children never fought with each other. 
They helped their parents at home and in the fields.
3: But they were not allowed to  go near a fire.
4: They had to do all their work during the night.
5: Because they were made of wax!
6: But one of the boys longed to go out in the sunlight.
7:
One day the longing was too strong. 
His brother and sister warned him.
8:
But it was too late!
He melted in the hot sun.
9: The wax children cried to see their brother melting away.
10:
But they made a plan. 
They shaped the lump of melted wax into a bird.
11: They took their bird brother up to a high mountain.
12: And as the sun rose, he flew away, singing in the morning light.
